00061 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00062 void CDriverLoginDlg::DoDataExchange
00063     (
00064     CDataExchange * aDataExchange
00065     )
00066 {
00067     CDialog::DoDataExchange( aDataExchange );
00068     DDX_Control( aDataExchange, IDC_DRIVERS_LST_DRIVERS, mListBox );
00069     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_DRIVERS_EDIT_ID, mDriverId );
00070     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_DRIVERS_EDIT_PASSWORD, mDriverPassword );
00071 }

00079 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00080 BOOL CDriverLoginDlg::OnInitDialog()
00081 {
00082     CDialog::OnInitDialog();
00083 
00084     updateListBox();
00085 
00086     GetDlgItem( IDC_DRIVERS_BTN_DELETE )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00087 
00088     SetWindowPos( NULL, 700, 350, 0, 0, SWP_NOSIZE | SWP_NOZORDER );
00089 
00090     return TRUE;
00091 } /* OnInitDialog() */

00093 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00096 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00097 void CDriverLoginDlg::updateListBox()
00098 {
00099     CString listItem;
00100 
00101     //must keep track of where the list was scrolled to
00102     //since we reset content we must reinitialize these
00103     mSelectedIndex = mListBox.GetCurSel();
00104     int topIndex = mListBox.GetTopIndex();
00105 
00106     //reset content and then add current canned responses
00107     mListBox.ResetContent();
00108     FileBackedMap<DriverLoginItem>::const_iterator iter = mCom.mDriverLogins.begin();
00109     for( ; iter != mCom.mDriverLogins.end(); iter++ )
00110     {
00111         if( iter->second.isValid() )
00112         {
00113             listItem.Format( _T("%s"), iter->second.getDriverId() );
00114             mListBox.AddString( listItem );
00115         }
00116     }
00117 
00118     //reset scroll and selection
00119     mSelectedIndex = -1;
00120 
00121     //reset scroll and selection
00122     mListBox.SetCurSel( mSelectedIndex );
00123     mListBox.SetTopIndex( topIndex );
00124 
00125 }   /* updateListBox() */
00126 
00127 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00130 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00131 void CDriverLoginDlg::OnBnClickedDelete()
00132 {
00133     UpdateData( TRUE );
00134     if( mSelectedIndex >= 0 )
00135         {
00136         mCom.mDriverLogins.remove( mCom.mDriverLogins.getKeyAt( mSelectedIndex ) );
00137         updateListBox();
00138         }
00139 
00140     if( mSelectedIndex < 0 )
00141     {
00142         GetDlgItem( IDC_DRIVERS_BTN_DELETE )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00143     }
00144 
00145 }   /* OnBnClickedDelete() */
00146 
00147 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00150 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00151 void CDriverLoginDlg::OnBnClickedSet()
00152 {
00153     UpdateData( TRUE );
00154     char driverId[50];
00155     char driverPassword[20];
00156 
00157     WideCharToMultiByte( CP_UTF8, 0, mDriverId, -1, driverId, sizeof( driverId ), NULL, NULL );
00158     WideCharToMultiByte( CP_UTF8, 0, mDriverPassword, -1, driverPassword, sizeof( driverPassword ), NULL, NULL );
00159 
00160     DriverLoginItem & login = mCom.mDriverLogins.get( driverId );
00161     login.setPassword( driverPassword );
00162 
00163     mCom.mDriverLogins.put( login );
00164 
00165     updateListBox();
00166 
00167 }   /* OnBnClickedSet() */
00168 
00169 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00173 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00174 void CDriverLoginDlg::OnEnChangeEditBoxes()
00175 {
00176     UpdateData( TRUE );
00177     if( mDriverId != "" && mDriverPassword != "" )
00178     {
00179         GetDlgItem( IDC_DRIVERS_BTN_SET )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00180     }
00181     else
00182     {
00183         GetDlgItem( IDC_DRIVERS_BTN_SET )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00184     }
00185 }   /* OnEnChangeEditBoxes() */
00186 
00187 
00188 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00193 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00194 void CDriverLoginDlg::OnLbnSelchangeDriverList()
00195 {
00196     CListBox * driverListBox = (CListBox*) GetDlgItem( IDC_DRIVERS_LST_DRIVERS );
00197     mSelectedIndex = driverListBox->GetCurSel();
00198 
00199     if( mSelectedIndex >= 0 && mSelectedIndex < driverListBox->GetCount() )
00200     {
00201         DriverLoginItem& item = mCom.mDriverLogins.get( mCom.mDriverLogins.getKeyAt( mSelectedIndex ) );
00202 
00203         mDriverId = item.getDriverId();
00204         mDriverPassword = item.getPassword();
00205 
00206         UpdateData( FALSE );
00207         GetDlgItem( IDC_DRIVERS_BTN_DELETE )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00208 
00209         OnEnChangeEditBoxes();
00210     }
00211     else
00212     {
00213         GetDlgItem( IDC_DRIVERS_BTN_DELETE )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00214     }
00215 
00216     driverListBox->SetCurSel( mSelectedIndex );
00217 }
